Mounier, Jean Joseph, 1758-1806

metadata.description: Also published under title: Extrait du procès-verbal des États de la province de Dauphiné, assemblés à Romans
Variant of Martin & Walter. Révolution française, III, 25376; IV:2, 4971a
Summarizes procedings from 31 December 1788 to 9 January 1789
Forms part of the French Revolution Collection at the Newberry Library
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
